Module “emd”¶

emd(data[, quek, shiftfactor, splinemean, ...]) The function estimates the empirical mode decomposition of a given data vector.
extrema(x[, minmax, strict, with_end]) The function will index the extrema of a given array x.
interp(pos, val, new_pos[, kind]) The function ‘interp’ interpolates the data.
zero_cross(data[, position]) The function returns the number of zero crossing in a given time series.
